column5: Hi all,  unwisely i brought my new reel to turks and caicos with me and didn't wash is fresh water after each use. Does anyone know of a shop that would clean/fix it up in the richmond hill/Markham area or even newmarket?  Its only a $65 reel but id rather pay 10-20$ to fix it verus ditching it.  Thanks!
reel is probably pooched from the salt water.
Angling specialties @ Hwy 7 & Keel, if the location suites you.

I doubt it, just bunged up with a lot of salt.  Have had it happen to a few of the Saharas I've fished in saltwater.  Nothing a once over with a toothbrush, some fresh water and a light oiling won't fix.
I can vouch for Ah_long from these forums too. Great guy to deal with!
